artefact.overview: To promote a lottery you need to register with a local authority in Northern Ireland
artefact.licence_short_description: Register with your local authority to promote a lottery in Northern Ireland.
artefact.licence_overview:
To promote a lottery in Northern Ireland you need to register with the local authority. 

Private lotteries and some small lotteries don't need to be registered.

details.description: Applying for licences from your council for events and businesses
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
